fields.value: - Choose one person each night to Countermail.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- If your target is targeted by any role with the suffix "mailer", or a similar role as determined by the host, you will apply the same effect to the player who applied it.
- You force a role with the suffix of "mailer" (or a similar role) to spawn, if one doesn't already exist.
